You reach a point where you've read too many doujin, you start to appreciate them for the story. I recommend readin those I stated above.

This is one of those odd masterpieces similar to ShindoL's "Metamorphosis" where the story contains many elements of "sad situations" on the characters but you still keep reading them because there is this engaging storytelling built in it that piqued your curiosity about "what's next".
